org.schema.schine.network.objects.remote

Class RemoteString

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.schema.schine.network.objects.remote.RemoteField<T>
      • org.schema.schine.network.objects.remote.RemoteComparable<String>
        • org.schema.schine.network.objects.remote.RemoteString
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<String>, NetworkChangeObservable, Streamable<String>

    public class RemoteString
extends RemoteComparable<String>
    The class to (de-)serialize Strings.
